name: nodebb
description: NodeBB is a modern, lightweight forum platform built on Node.js. It supports real-time updates, plugins, SSO, and themes and can be self-hosted or deployed as a managed cloud service.
features: Modern forum platform: Create discussion boards with categories, topics, and threaded replies.
Real-time updates: See new posts and replies instantly without page refreshes using WebSockets.
Plugin ecosystem: Extend functionality with hundreds of community plugins for features and integrations.
Theme customization: Customize appearance with themes or create custom designs with templates.
User management: Handle registration, profiles, reputation, and moderation tools.
SSO integration: Connect with OAuth providers or LDAP for unified authentication.
Mobile responsive: Optimized interface works seamlessly on phones, tablets, and desktops.
Search functionality: Find topics and posts quickly with full-text search and filters.
Notification system: Alert users of replies, mentions, and activity via email or push notifications.
Moderation tools: Flag content, ban users, and manage spam with built-in moderation features.
Analytics dashboard: Track forum activity, user engagement, and popular content.
Multi-language: Support international communities with translation plugins and RTL languages.
